name: Pac-Rat (Just Another Pacman Clone)
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys to move Pac-Rat along the maze.

Objective:

Collect all of the pills without losing all of your lives. Extra lives will be awarded at every 10000 points acquired (usually once or twice per level)...

There is only one real level, but it can be repeated to gain higher scores...

Just another Pac-Man clone... Early development stages... Probably not going to do much more unless people ask me to, which I doubt they will...

The downloadable version runs way smoother than the HTML5 version, and can be run in fullscreen (by pressing "Alt+Enter")...
